title: Winning 2016 Will Depend On God  He Is On Our Side - Prez John Mahama
text: Even though President John Dramani Mahama is confident the electorates will vote “massively” for him in the 2016 presidential election – he is not self-satisfied, believing the opposition New Patriotic Party [ NPP ] can pull a surprise. The
